)

rules.formula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)), ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "USD"), IsClosed, IsWon, ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "New Logo"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Dedicated/Private Cloud"), OR( AND( CloseDate >= DATE(2018,03,01), Amount < 750, OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "US Commercial Acq - Inbound 1"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "US Commercial Acq - Inbound 2"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "US Commercial Acq - Inbound 3"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "US Channel Inside Sales") ) ), AND( CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "US Enterprise - ACQ "), Amount < 2500, CloseDate > DATE(2018,04,01) ) ) )

rules.formula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(StageName)), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'US_Cloud', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Read_Only'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Onica_Type__c, 'ProServ'),ISPICKVAL(Onica_Type__c, 'MCO'),ISPICKVAL(Onica_Type__c,'EE')), OR( ISPICKVAL(Owner.Sub_Segment__c,'AWS'), ISPICKVAL(Owner.Sub_Segment__c,'Canada')) )

rules.description: all public cloud slack test
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(StageName)), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'US_Cloud', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Read_Only'))

rules.description: The standard Probability field needs to be overwritten with the NUTCASE Deal Probability value captured on the Opportunity when the record is saved/updated.
rules.formula: AND( AND(NUTCASE_Deal_Probability__c > 0,NUTCASE_Deal_Probability__c <100, NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"))), (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(NUTCASE_Deal_Probability__c) || ISCHANGED(StageName)) )

rules.description: Fee fields values made blank/null from not null/blank, should be initialized as 0.
rules.formula: OR(ISBLANK( Slicehost_Fees__c ), ISBLANK( Cloud_Setup_Fees__c ), ISBLANK( Cloud_Support_Fee_Forecast__c ), ISBLANK( Projected_Mail_Fees__c ), ISBLANK( Exchange_Fee__c ), ISBLANK( Migration_Fees__c ), ISBLANK( Hosting_Fee__c ),ISBLANK( service_fees_mrr__c ))

rules.fullName: Update Fee Fields values to Zero from Blank2
rules.description: Fee fields values made blank/null from not null/blank, should be initialized as 0(created to accommodate more than 10 field update in a workflow limitation)
rules.formula: OR(ISBLANK( service_fees__c), ISBLANK( Setup_Fee__c), ISBLANK( UNAS_Fees__c), ISBLANK( VM_Fees__c),ISBLANK( Debook_Amount__c), ISBLANK( Amount))

AND( NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)), ISBLANK(Lead_Date_Passed__c), ISBLANK(LDT_Date_Passed__c),
OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost")) ), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "Q Team")), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "LDT")), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "Frontline")) )

rules.description: Updates Supporting unit and Newton Field either when Quoteline that contains added with Rapid Deployment in the name is added Or when Supporting Unit is set to'Newton'

OBM 2 is triggered to FMW when any required mapped field as per Wiki is updated and Status is Closed Won, Approval Amount is updated AND (Participant Id is not blank.) Or When Partner role Created/Updated/Deleted with Role Source.
rules.formula: OR (AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), ROUND(PRIORVALUE(Approval_Amount__c),2) <> ROUND(Approval_Amount__c,2) , NOT(ISBLANK(Partner_Company__r.OIC_Participant_Id__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(OIC_Transaction_ID__c)), NOT(ISNEW()) ),AND(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'),NOT(ISBLANK(OIC_Transaction_ID__c)),OR(ISCHANGED( Partner_Company__c ),ISCHANGED(Commission_Role__c))))

rules.description: Reset Newton and support unit field when Quoteline is no longer has Rapid deployment .
